Method Summary
private java.lang.Object parseConfigOption(java.lang.Class clazz, java.lang.Object defaultValue, java.lang.Object value)

Assigns the option provided by the consumer's config, or returns the default value if the option was not provided or it was unable to be converted to the correct data type.
